scripts.dev:windows: bash -c 'source ~/.cargo/env && cargo tauri dev --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --runner cargo-xwin'
scripts.build:windows:exe: bash -c 'source ~/.cargo/env && cargo tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --runner cargo-xwin --no-bundle'
scripts.build:windows:debug:exe: bash -c 'source ~/.cargo/env && cargo tauri build --debug --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --runner cargo-xwin --no-bundle'
scripts.build:windows:debug:portable: npm run build:windows:debug:exe && bash tooling/scripts/stage-windows-portable.sh x86_64-pc-windows-msvc debug
scripts.build:windows: bash -c 'source ~/.cargo/env && cargo tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --runner cargo-xwin'
scripts.build:all: npm run build:linux && npm run build:windows
scripts.clean: cargo clean --manifest-path src-tauri/Cargo.toml && rm -rf src-tauri/binaries services/agent-host/dist apps/desktop/web/build apps/desktop/web/.svelte-kit
scripts.format: npm run format:svelte && npm run format:ts && npm run format:rust
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:svelte && npm run format:check:ts && npm run format:check:rust
